_field_real_fraction.name: peg threshold [0,1]#magnitude of analog input for pegged acceleration to kick in

_field_real_point_2d.name: pegged time#time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect
pegged scale#the maximum effect achieved over the duration of the pegged time.

_field_angle.name: peg max angular velocity:degrees per sec#the maximum turning speed during peg

_field_real_fraction.name: peg threshold [0,1]#magnitude of analog input for pegged acceleration to kick in

_field_real_point_2d.name: pegged time#time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect
pegged scale#the maximum effect achieved over the duration of the pegged time.

_field_angle.name: peg max angular velocity:degrees per sec#the maximum turning speed during peg

_field_real_fraction.name: peg threshold [0,1]#magnitude of analog input for pegged acceleration to kick in

_field_real_point_2d.name: pegged time#time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect
pegged scale#the maximum effect achieved over the duration of the pegged time.

_field_angle.name: peg max angular velocity:degrees per sec#the maximum turning speed during peg

_field_real_fraction.name: peg threshold [0,1]#magnitude of analog input for pegged acceleration to kick in

_field_real_point_2d.name: pegged time#time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect
pegged scale#the maximum effect achieved over the duration of the pegged time.

_field_angle.name: peg max angular velocity:degrees per sec#the maximum turning speed during peg

_field_real_fraction.name: magnetism friction#how much the crosshair slows over enemies
magnetism adhesion#how much the crosshair sticks to enemies
inconsequential target scale#scales magnetism level for inconsequential targets like infection forms
ads magnetism friction#how much the crosshair slows over enemies when in ads
ads magnetism adhesion#how much the crosshair sticks to enemies when in ads

_field_real_point_2d.name: crosshair location#-1..1, 0 is middle of the screen

_field_real.name: fireteam command mode duration:seconds#How long is command mode on after you initially attempt to issue an order
look autolevelling scale#1 is fast, 0 is none, >1 will probably be really fast

_field_short_integer.name: minimum autolevelling ticks#amount of time player needs to move and not look up or down for autolevelling to kick in

_field_angle.name: minimum angle for vehicle flipping#0 means the vehicle's up vector is along the ground, 90 means the up vector is pointing straight up:degrees

_field_explanation.name: weapons may optionally be set to require extra button hold time (e.g. ordnance power weapon drops)

_field_real.name: minimum action hold time:seconds#time that player needs to press ACTION to register as a HOLD
minimum action hold time for teammates:seconds#teammates of player who dropped/spawned weapon
minimum action hold time for opponents:seconds#opponents of player who dropped/spawned weapon
minimum action hold time for orders:seconds#orders to clear
accidental stick click threshold move stick#defaults to 0.8
accidental stick click threshold look stick#defaults to 0.8
throw channel width#how close to an axis you have to be
throw peg threshold#how far from the center you have to be
throw centered min time:s#how long the stick must be centered to start a throw
throw drawing max time:s#how long you can take to become pegged at the start of a throw
throw drawn max time:s#how long you can stay pegged at the start of a throw
throw throwing max time:s#how long you can take to throw the stick to pegged on the other side
flick peg jump max time:s#max time you can be pegged and then press jump to activate
double tap interval time:s#to engage double-tap, user must press jump twice in this much time
